title: Luxurious Duplex 4 Bed 2 Bath --- Central Air, W/D in unit, Parking
neighborhood: Newton / Newton Corner / Close 2 Whole Foods
posting_body: ['Hot New Listing', 'Wonderful Condo Quality 4 Bed 2 Full Bath in Prime Newton Location', 'Available for August 15th or Sept 1st or anytime inbetween Aug 15 - Sept 1 - also could be available slightly sooner than August 15th inquire for more info', 'Laundry in unit', 'Central Air', '2 Parking spaces included in monthly rent (if you need more than 2 spots it is possible but for more $ inquire for more info)', 'Duplex style unit - 2 floors of living space', 'High End Kitchen', 'Super nice bathrooms', 'Hardwood floors', 'Nice views - bright and sunny unit', 'Inquire for more info on pet policy', 'Amazing location - very close to Whole Foods, Commuter Rail, a bunch of nice restaurants and much more', 'Grad student OK - close to Boston College and several other schools', 'Video tour available inquire for more info', 'For showings, email patrick @ <URL> (no spaces) or text your email address to 508.243.5319', 'When reaching out please give a brief description of your group - what you do for work, etc', 'Patrick Gray', 'Metro Realty Corp', '508-243-5319', 'Also, feel free to check out my Youtube Channel for full video walkthroughs of several apartments in Boston, Brighton, Brookline and more.', 'New videos are added frequently, copy and paste link below or search Patrick Gray Real Estate on Youtube', 'https www youtube com channel UCdhMp_yHF3SmPQ8YS4-b9kQ']
